requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030 2GB | AMD RX550 2GB | Intel HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 2 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card that supports DirectX11 and with at least 1 GB of VRam;
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 4 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX11 support and with at least 2 GB of RAM (nVidia GTX660 or higher, or AMD HD5870 or higher);
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -
